controlMappings.rationale: Snyk identifies vulnerabilities in open source dependencies and provides remediation guidance
controlMappings.evidence: Real-time vulnerability database with fix recommendations and PR automation

controlMappings.rationale: Snyk provides automated remediation through dependency upgrades and patches
controlMappings.evidence: Automatic fix PRs and upgrade paths for vulnerable packages

controlMappings.rationale: Snyk performs continuous vulnerability monitoring of dependencies
controlMappings.evidence: CI/CD integration with ongoing monitoring and alerting

controlMappings.rationale: Snyk helps maintain baseline configurations by tracking dependency changes
controlMappings.evidence: License compliance and dependency tree analysis

controlMappings.rationale: Snyk provides software bill of materials (SBOM) for component inventory
controlMappings.evidence: Generates dependency graphs and component manifests
